DOC.brief_summary: This prospective , nonrandomized , feasibility study compare laboratory measure begin end study period adult consume nutritional study product .
DOC.criteria: Participant must agree refrain take supplement study product . Participant state willingness follow protocol describe , include consumption study product per protocol , perform finger stick/DBS Day 60 complete form need throughout study . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) > equal 35 kg/m2 Has plan elective surgery require 2 day hospitalization entire study Has state active malignant disease Has know history chronic renal parenchymal disease Has know history severe liver disease/liver failure Has psychiatric disorder would interfere study product consumption compliance study procedure Known allergy intolerance study product ingredient Participation another study approve concomitant study
